name: createroute-webpack-plugin
description: ![image](https://pic3.zhuanstatic.com/zhuanzh/n_v24595d76146fd4ea7b52b9b0cedd24d8f.png) ``` plugins: [   new CreateRoute({     pagesDir: 'src/view', // vue页面位置     mixin: { // 定义混入属性       'l': {         meta: {           auth: true         }       }     }   }) ] ```
